text: The Château de Plain-Marais is an historic castle in Beuzeville-la-Bastille, Manche, Lower Normandy, France. ==History== The castle was built during the Hundred Years' War.French Ministry of Culture: Château de Plain-Marais It was the private residence of Olivier Le Clerc de Juigné, who served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1815 to 1816. ==Architectural significance== It has been listed as an official monument since 1975. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Châteaux in Manche Category:Monuments historiques of Normandy
title: Château de Plain-Marais
